key_features: Give your body the total toning and strengthening workout
ai_description: A black cast iron kettlebell featuring a half-coating design. The textured bell portion is coated in black neoprene for corrosion protection, while the handle remains smooth, bare metal. The KAKSS brand logo appears in white on the front of the bell. The product is presented as new, photographed against a clean white background. Text overlays confirm the solid cast iron construction and neoprene coating feature.
